faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Airdrops are free token distributions by blockchain projects to promote their platforms or reward users.
faq.q2: Do I need to invest to get an airdrop?
faq.a2: Most airdrops are free, but some may require a small investment or task completion.
faq.a3: We ensure that all airdrops listed on our platform are from reputable projects. However, always do your own research.
faq.q4: What benefits does your platform offer?
faq.a4: Our platform provides curated airdrop guides, investment tracking, and a community for real-time support.
faq.q5: How often are new airdrops added?
faq.a5: We update our airdrop listings daily to ensure you have access to the latest opportunities.

help.title: & Feedback
help.subtitle: Find answers, get support, and share your feedback.

airdrops.title: About Airdrops
airdrops.description: Airdrops come in various forms, such as token distributions, NFT drops, or community rewards. While they offer opportunities, no airdrop is guaranteed to be safe or profitable. Always conduct your own research (DYOR) before participating. Our platform provides information, not investment advice.

contact.title: Contact & Account Creation
contact.description: Need help or want to create an account? Reach out directly via our Telegram channel. Our team will guide you through the process and answer any questions.

subscriptions.title: Subscription Plans
subscriptions.description: We offer three subscription plans to suit your needs:
subscriptions.monthly: Monthly: Access all features with a flexible monthly payment.
subscriptions.quarterly: Quarterly: Save with a three-month plan.
subscriptions.yearly: Yearly: Get the best value with a yearly plan.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Connect with other users, share tips, and stay updated by joining our Telegram and Discord communities.

feedback.title: Share Your Feedback
feedback.description: Your input helps us improve. Send us your suggestions or report issues via email.

terms.title: Terms & Privacy
terms.description: Review our terms of service and privacy policy to understand our practices.

terms_privacy.title: & Privacy
terms_privacy.subtitle: Understand our terms of service and privacy practices.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: By using our platform, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully. This is not legal advice; consult a lawyer for specific guidance.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

use.title: Use of the Platform
use.description: You agree to use our platform only for lawful purposes. You are responsible for your actions, including any content you submit or tasks you complete for airdrops.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Our platform provides information, not financial advice. We are not liable for any losses or damages resulting from your use of our services or participation in airdrops.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.

data_collection.title: Data Collection
data_collection.description: We collect information you provide, such as your email and account details, and usage data, such as browsing activity, to improve our services.

data_use.title: Data Use
data_use.description: Your information is used to provide and enhance our platform, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your data.

user_rights.title: Your Rights
user_rights.description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights or learn more about our practices.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about our Terms of Service or Privacy Policy, please reach out to our support team.
